title: 'Jordan Peterson and Christianity' with Paul VanderKlay
description:
As requested by our Rebel Wisdom viewers, an interview with Paul VanderKlay, the Christian pastor from Sacramento, California, who has made a name for himself as one of the most intelligent and popular commentators on Jordan Peterson's thought, from a Christian perspective.

Paul VanderKlay's Youtube channel is here: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCGsDIP_K6J6VSTqlq-9IPlg

Rebel Wisdom is a platform for the biggest ideas around. 
http://www.rebelwisdom.co.uk/

To help us make more of these films, please consider sponsoring us on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/rebelwisdom
